com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.hbase

Class HBaseStoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.common.DistributedStoreManager
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.hbase.HBaseStoreManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferMutationKeyColumnValueStore, KeyColumnValueStoreManager, StoreManager

    public class HBaseStoreManager
extends DistributedStoreManager
implements KeyColumnValueStoreManager
    Experimental storage manager for HBase.

    This is not ready for production.

    Author:
    Dan LaRocque
